name: Engine 91
description:
Take control of a mounted water cannon and put out the fires before the buildings crumble - or you run out of water.

Controls:

Left Handle moves the water cannon up and down

Right Handle moves the water cannon left and right.

Center Button turns water on/off

Space - OVR Main Menu

R - Re-orientate Rift

Requirements:

Requires Leap Motion and Oculus Rift
